Description: Pottery fragment of floor of 'Megarian' bowl. The fragment has a mould-made Gorgoneion with a border of ovules as a medallion on the inside; glossy black slip on inside and around part of the periphery on the underside. Fine pale red-brown fabric.
Bibliographic references: Vase / Catalogue of Vases in the British Museum (G112)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (ID.001) (Phase 3)
